title: Patch Notes
content: g no longer has a mind of its own. Removed the outdated God Rays setting from the Video options, which is now effectively covered by the Fog Quality setting. Fixed a potential memory corruption issue when loading out of a level while a player character is being confronted for a crime. Fixed screen tearing on Vulkan when VSync is disabled or set to Triple Buffering. Optimised the performance of inventories, particularly with lots of items in them.
